code: import React from'react';import'./Notifications.css';import closeIcon from'./close-icon.png';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Notifications=function Notifications(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{display:'inline',marginRight:'80%'},children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{"aria-label":"Close",onClick:console.log('Close button has been clicked'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{display:'inline'},src:closeIcon,alt:"Close"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{data:"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{data:"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{data:"urgent",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:getLatestNotification()}})]})]});};export default Notifications;
